.
Definition:Â  Original Determinative Authority
Original determinative authority
means, with respect to RO hearings, that in assigning hearing duties, RO management will assign a hearing to a person with the appropriate job title and decision-making authority to render a decision on the issue that is the subject of the hearing.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 1, Section D  - Regional Office (RO) Hearings
citation: Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 1, Section D
